casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Nathaniel Malone CHINA 95A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2017 *304Richard Croutharmel, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for China, Nathaniel Malone. Grady L. Balentine, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of March 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2017."
